message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.
I think we can do better, 55 for me, 45 for you
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle this. I'll take my previous offer of $55.
I'll take a bit more, considering the decreasing value
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
